summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.5°C) and outside temperature (down 5.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 729 m), light levels (up 7856 lux), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1676 m), light levels (up 9723 lux), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 728.9m lower than yesterday, 651.1m lower than the past week, 1675.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 995.3m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1646.4m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
